resources.string: Once the session starts you will not be able to close it, this is for the security of your data
Sign up with an email, either outlook or gmail.\nIt will have to be a valid email address, otherwise you will not be able to access it
find relevant information by clicking on the cards
indicate if you have any of these diseases
have you felt any of these symptoms today?
Diagnosis of your symptoms during this month

If you have mild symptoms, such as a mild cough or fever, you generally do not need to seek medical attention.
 Stay home, isolate yourself, and watch your symptoms. Follow national guidelines on self-isolation. 
 However, if you live in an area with malaria or dengue, it is important that you do not ignore fever.
 Seek medical help. When you go to the health center wear a mask if possible, stay at least one meter away from other people and do not touch the surfaces with your hands. In case the sick person is a child, help him to follow this advice.

 Se medical attention immediately if you have trouble breathing or feel chest pain or pressure. 
 If possible, call your health care provider in advance so they can direct you to the right health center.

Practicing respiratory and hand hygiene is important at ALL times and the best way to protect yourself and others. 

Whenever possible, keep at least a meter of distance between you and others. 
This is especially important if you are next to someone who is coughing or sneezing. 
Because some infected people may not yet have symptoms or their symptoms may be mild, 
you should keep a physical distance from everyone if you are in an area where the COVID-19 virus is circulating.
The confirmed symptoms of covid 19 have been 14, but you can be asymptomatic, remember to wear a mask and wash your hands frequently

VirusSearch is an App that promises to provide updated information on the areas of greatest infection of a specific virus, in the first stay this application will focus on the Covid-19\nDue to the current situation, the application is easy to understand and interactive, The key points to highlight are: the identification of danger sectors through a heat map according to level of risk, official statistical information worldwide, also the development of digital self-management through a form made by users to identify if they are carrying the virus, they can also go updating your health status.

- Anderson Javier Sinaluisa 
 
- Manuel Adrian Carpio 
 
- Drubber Elian Sanchez

- Carla Nereida Utterman 
 
- Galo Andres Manzo
By: \n Club de programaci√≥n Java ISTG
We need your help to give information on the areas affected by covid-19, please fill out the following survey

your location will serve to give information about the critical points
